name: BeSwitched
description:
School project done on construct 2.

An endless Shmup where you take control of your ennemies to survive.

You'll need a gamepad to play the game.

Controls :

In Menu :

  • D-pad to navigate
  • A to confirm
  • B to return

In Game :

  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to aim
  • LT to launch possession
  • RT to fire
  • Start to restart the game

Dev Team :

  • Flavien Charbit
  • Andréas Champagne
  • Guillaume Russo
  • Yanis Zazoua
